ygData.subject: Ebony Blade
ygData.msgSnippet: HI I have been in permafrost for most of the last week and a half have gone form level 21 to 25 fighting only in the preacher and Arch rooms. There are very
ygData.messageBody:
HI

I have been in permafrost for most of the last week and a half have gone
form level 21 to 25 fighting only in the preacher and Arch rooms. There are
very few people in perma doing this right now so pretty easy if you want to
take your friends up and grab one of the rooms.The items you can get are in
the Arch room the mask +3 str, and the ARch pack that lowers weight of
items by 20%. In the Preacher room Runed Circlet - 4AC, +4 intel, +4 wis,
Cold Iron Moring Star - damage 9, delay 28 I believe.

anyway what I need to know about the Ebony Blade. Stats, Where is it etc.
Thanks
